thread.title: Pizza delivery guy delivers more than just a pizza
thread.title_full: Pizza delivery guy delivers more than just a pizza

author: Kayla
title: Pizza delivery guy delivers more than just a pizza
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
Steven Donovan is just your average pizza guy (and awesome adventure photographer ) turned local hero after risking his job to save this lost dog. He was on his way to a delivery when he spotted a dog wandering around a very busy and dangerous street. He found the dog and brought him to his car realizing he had a name tag that said Mr. Snickers. Turns out the dog was only a few miles from home so he brought Mr. Snickers on his delivery. 2 
The people waiting for their pizza weren’t mad about the delay, in fact they thought it was awesome. After the delivery he dropped Mr. Snickers off at home and he’s safe and sound! 3 
Steven told Buzzfeed, “When I started getting close to his house, he kind of perked up and was looking around…wagging his tail, he knew he was about to be home.” 4
